Is the statement 'The presence of coordinatively unsaturated metal centers can greatly enhance the performance of MOFs' true or false?
What was the purpose of using the SQUEEZE routine in PLATON?
data.answer: To remove the contributions of electron density from disordered solvent molecules

data.question: What was the BET surface area of 1 after solvent evacuation?
Did the synthesis of 1-Mg0.86 involve the use of Mg(OMe)2?
What was the method used to perform the proton exchange and create the alkoxide frameworks?
data.answer: Stirring crystalline samples of 1 in dry THF/CH3CN with a metal source overnight

data.question: Is the statement 'The crystal structure of 1 gives 1 L2 strut per Zn2 cluster' true or false?
What was the method used to calculate the isosteric heat of adsorption for 1?
data.answer: Fitting hydrogen isotherms to a virial equation and using the fitting parameters

data.question: Was the presence of residual solvent detected in 1-Li and 1-Mg samples after evacuation?
What was the crystal color and habit of compound 1?
Is the statement 'The synthesis of L2 was obtained from TCI America and used without further purification' true or false?
What was the role of the SQUEEZE routine in the analysis of compound 1?
data.answer: It was applied to remove the contributions of electron density from disordered solvent molecules
